sentences.sContent: Then the numerical results show that new algorithm effectively overcomes the shortcomings of secant method, and evidently improves the convergent speed, convergent range and algorithm stability.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then the numerical results show that new algorithm effectively overcomes the shortcomings of secant method, and evidently improves the convergent speed, convergent range and algorithm stability.
sentences.sCn: 数值实验结果表明，这种算法不仅有效克服了割线法的缺陷，而且收敛速度、收敛范围和算法的稳定性也得到明显提高。

trans.tranOther: (of an angle) a trigonometric function that in a right-angled triangle is the ratio of the length of the hypotenuse to that of the adjacent side; the reciprocal of cosine
